rows.label: tev020501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Eliza about conditions in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Eliza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Eliza for her thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Eliza about conditions during the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask for Eliza's opinion of the war with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Eliza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Eliza about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0001
rows.name:
The chaos that ensued after the crash landing incited
many conflicts between city residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have been traveling throughout New LA with my
assistant, Alice, to help ease those tensions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0003
rows.name:
At times, I've put myself in danger by intervening
between feuding parties. But I won't let that stop me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0004
rows.name:
I believe that by stressing the importance of mutual
respect, I have helped to de-escalate many of these
conflicts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm not a BLADE operative, but I would like to continue
doing what I can as a civilian to help solve these sorts
of problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0010
rows.name:
When we lived on Earth, my assistant Alice and I
were active in volunteer organizations that fought
against the scourges of poverty and prejudice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I had hoped to use that experience to help people
through their troubles here on Mira as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0012
rows.name:
However, there is a limit to how much two people
can accomplish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Should we encounter a sufficiently difficult problem,
I hope we can turn to BLADE operatives like you for
assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0014
rows.name:
Although honestly, I hope you'd consider lending a
hand personally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Reaching across the vast gulf that separates us as
different species! Taking hands and working together!
What could be more wonderful than that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0020
rows.name:
I hope this is only the beginning, and that there will be
more friendship treaties with other alien races to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0021
rows.name:
We intend to launch an awareness campaign to head
off any feelings of discrimination or prejudice among
our own people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0022
rows.name:
I would very much like to make New LA a kinder and
more enlightened city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0023
rows.name:
You are a BLADE operative, are you not? We may fight
on different battlefields, but we still both fight to make
Mira a world of peace and equality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0028
rows.name:
I believed that I should make no attempt to defend
myself against my attackers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0029
rows.name:
I thought that if I avoided resistance beyond attempting
a dialogue with the assailants, that I could even get
through to the Ganglion themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0030
rows.name: Perhaps that idea was...naive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0035
rows.name: We have succeeded in fighting off our attackers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0036
rows.name:
And yet, I still can't stop wondering if perhaps there
was some other way to have gotten through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0037
rows.name:
After all, we live in the same universe—and on a planet
where we can communicate without regard for linguistic
barriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0038
rows.name:
How tragic it would be if—despite all that—it remained
impossible for us to understand each other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG0039
rows.name:
The next time fate puts us in conflict with some new
alien race, I hope we work harder to reconcile our
differences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1001
rows.name:
I went to visit the families of the Ma-non that were slain
by Alex.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1002
rows.name:
Despite the great tragedy they suffered, hardly any of
them held resentment towards us humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1003
rows.name:
Perhaps it is not their advanced technology we should
study, but their fundamental kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1004
rows.name:
I am going to give a public speech in an attempt to
help humanity understand and appreciate the many
virtues of the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1005
rows.name:
If your schedule allows it, [ST:playername ],
I hope that you will join us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1010
rows.name:
It's been a gradual process, but it seems the prejudice
many humans once held towards xenoforms is
beginning to fade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1011
rows.name:
The number of humans who have visited the Ma-non
ship has grown quite dramatically.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1012
rows.name: It's deeply gratifying to see our efforts bear fruit at last.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1013
rows.name:
But I could not have reached this point without your
assistance and Alice's devoted support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020501_MSG1014
rows.name:
I owe you both a great deal of gratitude.
And I hope that you will continue to be a force
for true freedom and equality in New LA![ST:wait ]
